newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Nakornthon Bank closes $100 mln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Nakornthon Bank closes $100 mln FRCD.

text.p: Nakornthon Bank's US$100 million floating rate certificate of deposit has been allotted, arranger Bayerische Landesbank said.
The five-year facility has put and call options in year three.
The issue was priced at par to float at 50 basis points over the six-month London Interbank Offered Rate. With fees, the all-in return for top-tier managers is 70 basis points.

Arrangers and lead managers, with US$8.75 million each, are Bayerische Landesbank Singapore, Commerzbank SEA, NordLB, Societe Generale Asia, Tat Lee Bank, Thai Farmers Bank, United Overseas Bank and Yasuda Trust. Development Bank of Singapore committed US$8 million.
Lead manager Berliner Bank committed US$5 million.

Managers, with US$3 million each, are Banca Commerciale Italiana, Girocredit, Landesbank Rheinland Pfalz Girozentrale. Managers with US$2 million each are Banca Nationale del Lavoro, Bank Austria, Landesbank Schleswig-Holstein and BW Bank.
